name: Wreckdolls
description:
This is a Student Project from the SAE Institute Cologne. 

We've created a Shooter/Brawler where the goal is to Shoot your oponents against the pinball bumpers. Customize your doll and challenge up to three friends in a local multiplayer to find out who has the best skills.

Team Members:

  • Mike Ponton - Team Lead and Engine Work
  • Tim Lapp - Lead Programmer
  • Monika Jakubowsky - Animations
  • David Rakowski - Character and Weapon Artist
  • Ricardo Parise - Environment Artist
  • Daniel Brück - Environment Artist
  • Ceren Sengülen - 2D Artist
  • Chris Schulz - Programming
  • Jannis Romes - Programming

You need to use a controller in order to be able to play the game
